dict.acceptation: 怀孕的；孕育着…的；富于想象的；富于成果的；

sent.orig: Jessica Alba is pregnant, Cate Blanchett is pregnant and Nicole Kidman is pregnant.
sent.trans: 除了杰西卡？阿尔芭、凯特？布兰切特，还有妮可？基德曼。”

sent.orig: Pregnant omen, how is him test pregnant, what sign to have?
sent.trans: 怀孕的征兆，怎么测试自己有没有怀孕，有没有什么征兆？

sent.orig: The serum compound W concentration measured in 118 pregnant women and 31 non-pregnant women by RIA.
sent.trans: 以放免法测定118例正常孕妇和31例健康未孕妇女血清W物质浓度。

sent.orig: Used-made questionnaire to investigate 50 pregnant women out-patient department and 50 pregnant women in in-patient department.
sent.trans: 采用自行设计的问卷调查表，分别对50例医院门诊孕妇及50例住院孕妇进行访谈式的问卷调查。

sent.orig: By far the most common craving of pregnant women is not to be pregnant.
sent.trans: 到现在为止怀孕的女人最大的渴望就是没有怀孕。
